document_data.mainbody:
The Hungry Flame was a run down tavern found in the city of Helms Hold circa the late 15 century DR.
The staff of the Hungry Flame were particularly discourteous to any patrons who did not bear the spellscars that were common among so many the Holds residents.
As of the 1470s DR, the tavern was the meeting place and headquarters for the Heirs of Azure, the group of spellscarred political activists that fought out against the "pureblood" citizens of Helms Hold.
